name: Saboteur!
overview: Saboteur! is a classic retro game hit made by Clive Townsend in 1985 for the ZX Spectrum 8-bit computer. In 1985 Saboteur! received prestigious award "The Crash Smash" from Crash magazine and was high-rated with 93% score. Now after 33 years SimFabric in collaboration with Clive Townsend prepared special remastered version of Saboteur! for Nintendo Switch. In the game you'll experience the original mission from the 1985 version. Additionally the story will continue with new levels and enemies. Now you'll be able to know more about Saboteur and his dark and secret story.
